summary: A utility class that extends PyTorch Lightning's checkpointing to automatically persist NeMo model files (.nemo) at the end of training, select and retain the best checkpoint based on a monitored metric, manage exponential moving average (EMA) copies, and handle cleanup of unfinished or excess checkpoints.
business_intent: Ensure robust, automated saving and versioning of NeMo models for reliable recovery, deployment, and experiment tracking in production or research pipelines.
